An official PGA TOUR host, the club comprises two signature-designed championship golf courses by the golf legends Arnold Palmer and Tom Watson, and a three-story, 100,000 plus square-foot Grand Clubhouse. 2000 SE Via Tesoro Port St. Lucie, FL 34984 Tel: 772-200-2662 Location Type: Country Clubs MENUS Weddings Wedding Menu Wedding Brunch EVENTS Book Your Holiday Party & Save! Now Through November 1st Receive 10% Off VIRTUAL TOUR GALLERY IN THE NEWS No news items have been posted at this time. VENUE INFORMATION Capacity (reception): 250 Capacity (dinner): 250 Max. affairs (at same time): Separate reception room: Yes Outdoor reception area: Yes Outdoor cocktail area: Yes Terrace: Yes Dance floor: Yes Valet parking: Yes Coat check: Yes Air conditioned: Yes Off premise available: Yes In-house party planner: Yes Live music allowed: Yes DJ allowed: Yes AV equipment available: Yes Guest accommodations: No Cuisine: American Kosher available: Yes Kitchen on premises: Yes Must use in-house caterer: Yes Must use in-house liquor: Yes Ceremony: On Site Bridal changing room: Yes BOOKING INFORMATION Price range per person: Starting at $145 Advanced booking required: Yes Advanced deposit required: Call for Details Seasonal pricing flexibility: Yes Room availability (hours): All Hours TESTIMONIALS Excellent !

We absolutely loved our wedding and entire experience with the Crane Club. Everyone was very responsive, experienced, and walked us through the whole process. The food was amazing and all guests enjoyed the entire experience. We couldn’t have asked for better. Aixa I could not ask for a more perfect wedding venue! From the terrace for the ceremony to the bridal suite WING! The staff and food was also incredible! I was told multiple times it was the best wedding people have been to. Not to mention the amount of communication and prompt responses! I couldn't be happier!! Cristina C Our experience at Crane Club was nothing short of perfection! From the moment we started planning, the team at Crane Club made every step seamless and enjoyable. The entire process felt effortless, thanks to the incredibly organized and attentive staff, who went above and beyond to ensure our day was exactly as we dreamed. The venue itself was breathtaking for both our ceremony and reception, and the attention to detail in every aspect was impeccable. Our guests are still raving about the delicious food, and the service was flawless all night long. Every staff member was attentive, professional, and genuinely invested in making our day special. Thank you, Crane Club, for helping us create the most unforgettable day. We couldn’t have imagined a more perfect place to celebrate our wedding! Jessica L Our Dream Wedding Venue!

The Crane Club was our ultimate dream wedding venue! From our first visit at the Crane Club, we knew that it had something very special! From the long luxurious ride up to the venue, to the multiple levels and grand bridal suites, you get to call this amazing space all yours for your entire wedding day! In addition, the food is incredible, from the lunch and snacks we ordered for the bridal parties, to the unique stations we selected at our cocktail hour, to all of the various dinner options to choose from, to our late night snacks at our after party, we received so many amazing compliments on the food all day! Also, we cared a lot about our decor and the atmosphere we wanted to create and you can really make the place your own for the day, there wasn’t a detail we wanted left out of place. Last, the staff is incredible! They worked with us from the very start to the very last day leading up to our wedding day to plan our entire day, handle all of the logistics, and work with both our wedding planner and all of our vendors! We really felt great support, care, and attention to us and making our Wedding day the best day of our lives! Alyssa A Dream Wedding Come True – Beyond Our Expectations!

We recently had our wedding at The Crane Club, and we truly cannot say enough wonderful things about the entire experience. From the very beginning, the team was warm, professional, and incredibly attentive to every detail. They made us feel completely supported throughout the planning process and went above and beyond to ensure our day was perfect.
The venue itself is absolutely stunning – from the beautifully maintained grounds to the elegant reception space, it created the magical atmosphere we had always hoped for. Our guests are still raving about how gorgeous everything was and how smoothly the day went. What really stood out was how personalized everything felt. The staff took the time to understand our vision and brought it to life in ways that exceeded all our expectations. The coordination on the day of the event was flawless – we didn’t have to worry about a thing and were able to truly enjoy every moment. We are beyond grateful to The Crane Club for making our wedding day unforgettable. If you’re looking for a venue that combines beauty, professionalism, and genuine care, look no further. This place is an absolute gem!
